com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Util

Class MarkdownUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.CommandPackage.Util.MarkdownUtils

  • public class MarkdownUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to cleanly format text with Markdown. It is by the EventHandler thread and is recommended for to be used by command package implementations as well.
    Author:
    Cardinal System
